column4: Pike: Thank you for your tip. But i only need an good 2d-performance. The card is - imho - fine for me. So where are the major differences to nv-cards? Better 2d?
have you tried installing the ati drivers thru automatiX?
The drivers are installed and funtional.
i had an ATI card, and finally put an nvidia in its place...the difference in noticable
